If we download a Risk Register from PMI webpage, we can see options A and D are in the file. So in order to see if the Risk Register has been updated in an effective way we should see parameters inside of this document.

Checking meeting agendas is important for communication purposes but it is not related to the effectiveness of the documentation of the Risk Register

choices.A: Check for risk classification and that probability and impact are identified.
choices.D: Check to ensure that risk origin, triggering event, and ownership is identified.
choices.C: Check to ensure the risk meeting agenda and supporting documents are distributed.
choices.E: Check to ensure that the risks are gathered using Delphi technique.
choices.B: Check to ensure that the risk is supported by a Monte Carlo simulation.
